system.description: You are strong enough to lift anyone, and an ally can ride on top of you if you let them. When you pick someone up and throw them, roll +Courage.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value:
They go where they wanted to.

They choose one:

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
They go roughly where you wanted them to.

They choose one:

success.label: Success!
success.value:
They go roughly where you wanted them to.

You choose one:

system.choices:
• They land safely on their feet, avoiding harm.
  • They crash into someone, dealing damage to whoever they hit.
  • They crash through something, taking damage and destroying it.
